item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, October 16, 2024 at 1:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Graphite, a Blender-inspired 2D procedural design Rust app (511 points | 73 comments)
2. Floss/fund: $1M per year for free and open source projects (138 points | 28 comments)
3. CapibaraZero: A cheap alternative to FlipperZero based on ESP32-S3 (289 points | 57 comments)
4. The C23 edition of Modern C (449 points | 248 comments)
5. MacOS sometimes leaks traffic after system updates (211 points | 89 comments)
6. Show HN: I built the most over-engineered Deal With It emoji generator (713 points | 137 comments)
7. Redbox left PII on decommissioned machines (173 points | 79 comments)
8. Show HN: I 3D scanned the tunnels inside the Maya Pyramid Temples at Copan (368 points | 70 comments)
9. Eye Contact Correction: Redirecting the eyes to look at the camera (104 points | 106 comments)
10. Asterinas: OS kernel written in Rust and providing Linux-compatible ABI (281 points | 153 comments)
11. The Internet Archive is back online (134 points | 35 comments)
12. Why don't we use awnings anymore (2022) (221 points | 200 comments)
13. Intel spends more on R&D than Nvidia and AMD combined (12 points | 9 comments)
14. Damas-Hindley-Milner inference two ways (74 points | 4 comments)
15. Show HN: Pumpkin – A Modern Minecraft server written in Rust (366 points | 139 comments)
16. Apple introduces iPad mini built for Apple Intelligence (282 points | 423 comments)

18. How ham radio endures (83 points | 28 comments)
19. Australian coal plant in 'extraordinary' survival experiment (79 points | 113 comments)
20. FreeBSD/EC2 boot performance over time (94 points | 31 comments)
21. Show HN: FTWA – Turn any website into an app (110 points | 37 comments)
22. Life expectancy rise in rich countries slows down: took 30 years to prove (161 points | 334 comments)
23. Show HN: Mermaid ASCII Diagrams (203 points | 41 comments)
24. Cofounder Mode: My tactical guide to finding a cofounder (104 points | 50 comments)
25. Big advance on simple-sounding math problem was a century in the making (107 points | 27 comments)
26. Show HN: A Markdown-based alternative to package.json scripts and makefiles (96 points | 45 comments)
27. The Sundial Cannon of Åtvidaberg (2017) (59 points | 26 comments)
28. In Jordan, a ‘stunning’ discovery under Petra’s ancient stone (87 points | 54 comments)
29. Web Browser Engineering (2021) (706 points | 117 comments)
30. I Self-Hosted Llama 3.2 with Coolify on My Home Server (184 points | 80 comments)
